fehd.ADR_TC: 香港中環善慶街7號和9號地下A鋪

geocode_en.formatted_address: Hong Kong, 中環善慶街7號G/F

result.adr_address: Hong Kong, 中環善慶街7號G/F
result.formatted_address: Hong Kong, 中環善慶街7號G/F
result.name: Whisky & Words

reviews.text:
The Seven Wonders reunited in one bar at Whisky & Words: 
1) Stunning cocktails with large offering of fine whiskies
2) A chic deco, with travel-book theme  (Hermes painting), intimate light, cozy interior
3) Friendly waiters (+ each having special skills - such as photographic skills, magician talent, perfect fit for your private event!)
4) Perfect place for private event (could not dream of better place for my 30th birthday party,  perfect size for 30-40 persons)
5) Whisky tasting classes organised on a regular basis 
6) Modern bar, with R&B, Hip-hop music
7) Passionate founders of the bar, who have extensive know-how and a great party mood

A must-go speakeasy whisky bar for a memorable night! 🥳🎉✨

Had a wonderful time at Whisky & Words last weekend. It was our first time visiting and there happened to be an event on. Nonetheless, they made space for us and we got to enjoy the tasting of some fine whiskys. The establishment is intimate, but worth checking out if you want knowledgeable bartenders serving you.

First time Ive been here. Ordered 2 glasses of whisky. BIG MISTAKE! I should've ordered more. 
Great whisky selection, staff is friendly and knowledgable :)
Huge collection of whisky and amazing cocktails. It’s definitely the place to be in Hong Kong.

I highly recommend this bar to anyone looking to spend a relaxing night and enjoy fine whisky away from the hustle and bustle of Hong Kong's busy streets. The slick interior design, intricate lighting and mellow hip hop beats which plays in the background create an intimate atmosphere that will make you instantly feel at ease. Whisky & Words isn't named for any reason : beyond it's wide selection of bottles, Manu, Devon and Asha will happily engage in conversation. Whether you're looking to deepen your knowledge of whisky from experts in the field or know which bar to explore next, the welcoming staff will make you feel at home, and most probably make your night.

result.adr_address: 香港中環善慶街7號G/F
result.name: Whisky & Words

reviews.text: 현지 사람들에게 소문듣고 찾아갔는데...역시 좋네요. 소호거리근처에 있는데, 홍콩인듯 유럽인듯 묘한분위기에 착한가격. 바텐더나 종업원들 너무 친절...요즘 BTS 덕에 한국에서 왔다고 하면 다 잘해줌. 홍콩여행중 강추...

The Seven Wonders reunited in one bar at Whisky & Words: 
1) Stunning cocktails with large offering of fine whiskies
2) A chic deco, with travel-book theme  (Hermes painting), intimate light, cozy interior
3) Friendly waiters (+ each having special skills - such as photographic skills, magician talent, perfect fit for your private event!)
4) Perfect place for private event (could not dream of better place for my 30th birthday party,  perfect size for 30-40 persons)
5) Whisky tasting classes organised on a regular basis 
6) Modern bar, with R&B, Hip-hop music
7) Passionate founders of the bar, who have extensive know-how and a great party mood

A must-go speakeasy whisky bar for a memorable night! 🥳🎉✨

Had a wonderful time at Whisky & Words last weekend. It was our first time visiting and there happened to be an event on. Nonetheless, they made space for us and we got to enjoy the tasting of some fine whiskys. The establishment is intimate, but worth checking out if you want knowledgeable bartenders serving you.

First time Ive been here. Ordered 2 glasses of whisky. BIG MISTAKE! I should've ordered more. 
Great whisky selection, staff is friendly and knowledgable :)

Whisky&words
소호에서 만나는 위스키바. 
윗동네로 올라가는 계단 주변에 위치하고 있어 꼼꼼하게 살펴야 찾을수 있는데 시피크이지까진 아니더라도 숨어있는곳 찾아가는 느낌
해피아워에 낮술하러 들렸더니 몰트 HKD60, 칵테일 HKD80 ㅎㅎ 커버차지도 없으니 거저다🤗🤗😎
칵테일바만 너무 많아 위스키나 몰트등 조용히 술마시는것 좋아하시는분들에게 추천드려요!!
실내공간은 작지만 편하고 친절해요
아래서 올라가기 보다는 헐리웃로드쪽에서 내려가는편이 방문이 수월하니 참고하세요!
